sqlQuery.name: AllDatasets
sqlQuery.sql: select dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter where category is null OR category != 'Link outs'

select dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter where (category is null OR category != 'Link outs') and project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' and dataset_presenter_id in (select dataset_presenter_id from apidbtuning.datasetproperty where property='isPublic' and value='true' ) UNION select dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter where (category is null OR category != 'Link outs') and project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' and '@SHOW_UNRELEASED_DATA@' = 'true' and dataset_presenter_id in (select dataset_presenter_id from apidbtuning.datasetproperty where property='isPublic' and value='false' ) UNION select d.dataset_stable_id FROM apidbuserdatasets.installeduserdataset i, apidbuserdatasets.userdatasetowner o, apidbuserdatasets.datasetattributes d, apidbuserdatasets.USERDATASETPROJECT p WHERE i.user_dataset_id = d.user_dataset_id and i.user_dataset_id = o.user_dataset_id and i.user_dataset_id = p.user_dataset_id and p.project = '@PROJECT_ID@' and o.USER_ID = $$user_id$$ UNION select d.dataset_stable_id FROM apidbuserdatasets.installeduserdataset i, apidbuserdatasets.userdatasetsharedwith s, apidbuserdatasets.datasetattributes d, apidbuserdatasets.USERDATASETPROJECT p WHERE i.user_dataset_id = d.user_dataset_id and i.user_dataset_id = s.user_dataset_id and i.user_dataset_id = p.user_dataset_id and p.project = '@PROJECT_ID@' and s.recipient_user_id = $$user_id$$

select dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter where (category is null OR category != 'Link outs') and project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' UNION select d.dataset_stable_id FROM apidbuserdatasets.installeduserdataset i, apidbuserdatasets.userdatasetowner o, apidbuserdatasets.datasetattributes d, apidbuserdatasets.USERDATASETPROJECT p WHERE i.user_dataset_id = d.user_dataset_id and i.user_dataset_id = o.user_dataset_id and i.user_dataset_id = p.user_dataset_id and p.project = '@PROJECT_ID@' and o.USER_ID = $$user_id$$ UNION select d.dataset_stable_id FROM apidbuserdatasets.installeduserdataset i, apidbuserdatasets.userdatasetsharedwith s, apidbuserdatasets.datasetattributes d, apidbuserdatasets.USERDATASETPROJECT p WHERE i.user_dataset_id = d.user_dataset_id and i.user_dataset_id = s.user_dataset_id and i.user_dataset_id = p.user_dataset_id and p.project = '@PROJECT_ID@' and s.recipient_user_id = $$user_id$$

sqlQuery.name: SitemapDatasets
sqlQuery.sql: select dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter

sqlQuery.name: SitemapDatasets
sqlQuery.sql: select dpres.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dpres, apidbtuning.datasetproperty dprop where dpres.dataset_presenter_id = dprop.dataset_presenter_id and dprop.property = 'isPublic' and dprop.value = 'true' and dpres.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@'

sqlQuery.name: MapStudiesForToolbar
sqlQuery.sql: select dpres.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dpres, apidbtuning.datasetproperty dprop where dpres.dataset_presenter_id = dprop.dataset_presenter_id and dprop.property = 'isPublic' and dprop.value = 'true' and dpres.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' intersect select dpres.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dpres, apidbtuning.datasetproperty dprop where dpres.dataset_presenter_id = dprop.dataset_presenter_id and dprop.property = 'templateInjectorClassName' and dprop.value = 'GenomicsEDAStudy' and dpres.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@'

sqlQuery.name: ByReferenceName
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct ref.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id, ref.target_name, ref.record_type, dnt.TAXON_ID from apidbtuning.datasetmodelref ref, apidbtuning.datasetnametaxon dnt where ref.DATASET_PRESENTER_ID = dnt.DATASET_PRESENTER_ID and ('any' = '$$taxon$$' or (dnt.taxon_id = 0 or dnt.taxon_id = $$taxon$$)) and ref.target_name = $$reference_name$$ and ref.record_type = $$record_class$$

sqlQuery.name: ByReferenceNameNoTaxon
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct ref.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id, ref.target_name, ref.record_type from apidbtuning.datasetmodelref ref, apidbtuning.datasetnametaxon dnt where ref.dataset_presenter_id = dnt.dataset_presenter_id and ref.target_name = $$reference_name$$ and ref.record_type = $$record_class$$

sqlQuery.name: ById
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from APIDBTUNING.datasetnametaxon where dataset_presenter_id in ($$dataset_id$$)

sqlQuery.name: ByExternalDatabaseNames
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from APIDBTUNING.datasetnametaxon where name IN ($$dataset_name$$)

sqlQuery.name: ByQuestionName
sqlQuery.sql: select dsp.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbtuning.datasetmodelref ref, apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dsp where dsp.dataset_presenter_id = ref.dataset_presenter_id and ref.target_name = $$question_name$$ and ref.target_type = 'question'

sqlQuery.name: ByRecordClass
sqlQuery.sql: select DISTINCT dsp.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbtuning.datasetmodelref ref, apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dsp where dsp.dataset_presenter_id = ref.dataset_presenter_id and ref.record_type = $$record_class$$ and ref.target_type IN ('table', 'attribute','profile_graph')

sqlQuery.name: ByType
sqlQuery.sql: select DISTINCT dsp.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbtuning.datasetmodelref ref, apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dsp where dsp.dataset_presenter_id = ref.dataset_presenter_id and ref.record_type = $$record_class$$ and dsp.type = $$dataset_type$$

sqlQuery.name: ByTypeAndSubtype
sqlQuery.sql: select DISTINCT dsp.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbtuning.datasetmodelref ref, apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dsp where dsp.dataset_presenter_id = ref.dataset_presenter_id and ref.record_type = $$record_class$$ and dsp.type = $$dataset_type$$ and (dsp.subtype = $$dataset_subtype$$ or dsp.display_category = $$dataset_subtype$$)

sqlQuery.name: ByCategoryAndSubtype
sqlQuery.sql: select DISTINCT dsp.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dsp where (category IS NULL and dsp.display_category = $$dataset_category$$) or (dsp.display_category IS NULL and dsp.category = $$dataset_category$$) or (nvl(dsp.display_category, dsp.category) = $$dataset_category$$ and case when lower(category) = 'phenotype' OR lower(display_category) = 'phenotype' then 'phenotype' else lower(subtype) end like lower($$dataset_subtype$$) ) or (dsp.category = 'Immunology' and lower(display_category) = lower($$dataset_subtype$$)) or nvl(dsp.category, dsp.display_category) = $$dataset_category$$

sqlQuery.name: ByCategoryAndOrganism
sqlQuery.sql: select DISTINCT dsp.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id from apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dsp, apidbtuning.datasetnametaxon dnt, sres.taxonname tn where nvl(dsp.display_category, dsp.category) = $$dataset_category$$ and dsp.dataset_presenter_id = dnt.dataset_presenter_id and dnt.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id and tn.name_class = 'scientific name' and tn.name = $$organism$$

sqlQuery.name: ByUserId
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT d.dataset_presenter_id as dataset_id, d.dataset_presenter_id as study_id, CASE WHEN u.study_access is null THEN d.study_access ELSE u.study_access END as restriction_level FROM (select dataset_presenter_id, value as study_access from apidbtuning.datasetproperty where property = 'studyAccess') d, (select v.dataset_presenter_id, r.name as study_access from studyaccess.end_users@ACCT_DBLINK@ v INNER JOIN studyaccess.restriction_level@ACCT_DBLINK@ r ON v.restriction_level_id = r.restriction_level_id where user_id = $$user_id$$ AND (approval_status_id < 1 or approval_status_id is NULL) ) u WHERE d.dataset_presenter_id = u.dataset_presenter_id(+)

sqlQuery.name: AllDatasets
sqlQuery.sql: select dataset_presenter_id, dataset_presenter_name, project_name from apidb.legacydataset where project_name = '@PROJECT_ID@'
